name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PinSort Pro - Sort, Download Images & Videos

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PinSort Pro: Enhance your Pinterest experience. Sort pins by saves and repins, with the option to easily download images and videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PinSort Pro: Enhance your Pinterest experience. Sort pins by saves and repins, with the option to easily download images and videos.

- For Checking Highest/Lowest Saved Pin - Sort by Saves
- For Checking Most Repinned  - Sort by Repins
- For Downloading Image or Video Click on the download Button highlighted in red colour.
